description: Monitor for newly constructed logon behavior across Microsoft's SharePoint which can be configured to report access to certain pages and documents. (Citation: Microsoft SharePoint Logging) As information repositories generally have a considerably large user base, detection of malicious use can be non-trivial. Analytic 1 - Suspicious actor IPs, unusual user agents (e.g., malware, scripting interpreters like PowerShell, Python), anomalous login times index="azure_ad_signin_logs" Resource="Office 365 SharePoint Online" AND (UserAgent="PowerShell" OR UserAgent="Mozilla") | stats count by UserAgent, UserID, IPAddress, Location | where IPAddress!="expected_ip" OR Location!="expected_location"
